headline: Jim Cramer Discusses Reports Of Paramount Skydance (PSKY) Acquiring Warner Bros.
summary: We recently published 12 Hot, Cold & Stable Stocks Jim Cramer Recently Discussed. Paramount Skydance Corp. (NASDAQ:PSKY) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. headline: Comcast Connects First Homes in the Town of Buchanan, VA to Reliable, High-Speed Internet From Xfinity
summary: Town of Buchanan, Va., September 23, 2025--Comcast today announced it connected the first residents in the Town of Buchanan, VA to Xfinity services. This rural network expansion includes all residents in the Town of Buchanan – connecting more than 750 homes to high-speed, symmetrical Internet powered by America’s smartest and most reliable converged network.

headline: Is Comcast Primed for a Rebound After Job Cuts in Its Largest Division?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Comcast stock? You are definitely not alone. Comcast is a household name, but lately, it has felt more like a rollercoaster ride than a steady climb. In just the past year, shares have dropped about 20%, and so far this year they are down nearly 16%. Even the last month saw a 7.8% pullback, and the short-term picture looks rough with a 3.5% drop in just seven days. Longer term, if you zoom out to three years, holders have seen a 12% gain, but the five-year story...
